trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: 提供設計階段支援<xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref>視覺化設計工具中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this class, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如需此類別的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>類別文件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelDesigner"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]在內部建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelDesigner>類別時，它會建立相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項或該控制項的設計介面上的複本。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Returns the HTML markup that is used to display the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control, and populates the collection with the current control designer regions.
trans-unit.target: 傳回用來顯示的 HTML 標記<xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref>控制，並於其中填入目前控制項設計工具區域集合。

trans-unit.source: The control designer regions for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 針對關聯控制項的控制項設計工具區域。

trans-unit.source: The design-time HTML markup for the associated control, which includes all control designer regions.
trans-unit.target: 其中包括所有控制項設計工具區域關聯控制項設計階段 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: Returns the content for an editable region of the design-time view of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的設計階段檢視的可編輯區域內容<xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The region to update.
trans-unit.target: 要更新的區域。

trans-unit.source: A serialized copy of the template that is used to render the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 用來呈現關聯之範本的序列化的複本<xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref>控制項在設計階段。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 初始化指定的元件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> component that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"> </xref>實作元件<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the content for the editable region of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 指定的可編輯區域內容<xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref>控制項在設計階段。

trans-unit.source: The region to update.
trans-unit.target: 要更新的區域。

trans-unit.source: A serialized template for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 針對關聯控制項的序列化的範本。

trans-unit.source: Called when the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control changes.
trans-unit.target: 時呼叫相關聯<xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref>控制的變更。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the designer should use a temporary copy of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control to generate the design-time markup, instead of using the actual control that is associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出設計工具是否應該使用的暫存副本<xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref>控制項以產生設計階段標記，而不是使用與設計工具相關聯的實際控制項。

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
